member.name: T:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier
member.summary: ประเภทข้อมูล

member.name: F:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier.PayloadFormatIndicator
member.summary: Version of the QR Code template.

member.name: F:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier.PointOfInitiationMethod
member.summary: Identifies the communication technology and whether the data is static or dynamic.
member.remarks: The value of "11" is used when the same QR Code is shown for more than one transaction. The value of "12" is used when a new QR Code is shown for each transaction.

member.name: F:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier.MerchantAccountInformation
member.remarks: 02-03 are Reserved for Visa. 04-05 are Reserved for Mastercard 06-08 are Reserved by EMVCo 09-10 are Reserved for Discover 11-12 are Reserved for Amex 13-14 are Reserved for JCB 15-16 are Reserved for UnionPay 17-25 are Reserved by EMVCo 26-51 are Templates reserved for additional payment networks.

member.name: F:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier.MerchantCategoryCode
member.summary: The Merchant Category Code (MCC) shall contain an MCC as defined by [ISO18245].

member.name: F:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier.TransactionCurrency
member.summary: Indicates the currency code of the transaction.

member.name: F:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier.TransactionAmount
member.summary: The transaction amount, if known. If present, this value is displayed to the consumer by the mobile application when processing the transaction. If this data object is not present, the consumer is prompted to input the transaction amount to be paid to the merchant.

member.name: F:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier.TipOrConvenienceIndicator
member.summary: Indicates whether the consumer will be prompted to enter a tip or whether the merchant has determined that a flat, or percentage convenience fee is charged.

member.name: F:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier.CountryCode
member.summary: The Country Code shall contain a value as defined by [ISO 3166-1 alpha 2].

member.name: F:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier.MerchantName
member.summary: The Merchant Name shall be present.

member.name: F:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier.MerchantCity
member.summary: The Merchant City shall be present.

member.name: F:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier.PostalCode
member.summary: If present, the Postal Code should indicate the postal code of the merchant’s physical location. Depending on the country, the Postal code is the Zip code or PIN code or Postal code of the merchant.

member.name: F:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier.CRC
member.summary: Checksum calculated over all the data objects included in the QR Code.

member.name: F:Saladpuk.Contracts.EMVCo.QrIdentifier.MerchantInformationLanguageTemplate
member.summary: The Merchant Information—Language Template includes merchant information in an alternate language and may use a character set different from the Common Character Set. It provides an alternative to the merchant information under the root.

member.name: T:Saladpuk.Contracts.ICyclicRedundancyCheck
member.summary: มาตรฐานตัวตรวจสอบความถูกต้องตามมาตรฐาน ISO / IEC 13239
member.remarks: The checksum shall be calculated according to[ISO / IEC 13239] using the polynomial '1021' (hex) and initial value 'FFFF' (hex). The data over which the checksum is calculated shall cover all data objects, including their ID, Length and Value, to be included in the QR Code, in their respective order, as well as the ID and Length of the CRC itself(but excluding its Value). Following the calculation of the checksum, the resulting 2-byte hexadecimal value shall be encoded as a 4-character Alphanumeric Special value by converting each nibble to an Alphanumeric Special character.
member.example: A CRC with a two-byte hexadecimal value of '007B' is included in the QR Code as "6304007B"

member.name: M:Saladpuk.Contracts.ICyclicRedundancyCheck.ComputeChecksum(System.String)
member.summary: สร้างรหัสเช็คความถูกต้องของข้อมูล
member.param: ข้อมูลที่ต้องการนำไปสร้างรหัส
